trans-unit.source: Provides the managed definition of the <see langword="IBindCtx" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see langword="IBindCtx" /> 接口的托管定义。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 本机代码中的 COM 方法将返回的 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the object parameter enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含对对象参数枚举数的引用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the strings that are the keys of the internally maintained table of contextual object parameters.
trans-unit.target: 枚举字符串，这些字符串是在内部维护的上下文对象参数表的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::EnumObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::EnumObjectParam`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the structure to receive the binding options.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收绑定选项的结构的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current binding options stored in the current bind context.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前存储在当前绑定上下文中的绑定选项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetBindOptions` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::GetBindOptions`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the object interface pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含对象接口指针。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Looks up the given key in the internally maintained table of contextual object parameters and returns the corresponding object, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 在内部维护的上下文对象参数表中查找给定的项并返回相应的对象（如果此对象存在的话）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::GetObjectParam`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the Running Object Table (ROT).
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含对运行对象表 (ROT) 的引用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns access to the Running Object Table (ROT) relevant to this binding process.
trans-unit.target: 返回对与此绑定进程相关的运行对象表 (ROT) 的访问权。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetRunningObjectTable` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::GetRunningObjectTable`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The object to register for release.
trans-unit.target: 要为释放而注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: Registers the passed object as one of the objects that has been bound during a moniker operation and that should be released when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 将传递的对象注册为已在名字对象操作期间绑定且应在此操作完成之后释放的对象之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The name to register <c>punk</c> with.
trans-unit.target: 用于注册 <c>punk</c> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The object to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified object pointer under the specified name in the internally maintained table of object pointers.
trans-unit.target: 以内部维护的对象指针表中的指定名称注册指定的对象指针。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::RegisterObjectParam`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the objects currently registered with the bind context by using the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IBindCtx.RegisterObjectBound(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 释放所有当前由 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IBindCtx.RegisterObjectBound(System.Object)" /> 方法用绑定上下文注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::ReleaseBoundObjects` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::ReleaseBoundObjects`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The object to unregister for release.
trans-unit.target: 要为释放而注销的对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes the object from the set of registered objects that need to be released.
trans-unit.target: 从需要释放的注册对象集中移除该对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RevokeObjectBound` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::RevokeObjectBound`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The key to unregister.
trans-unit.target: 要注销的键。

trans-unit.source: Revokes the registration of the object currently found under the specified key in the internally maintained table of contextual object parameters, if that key is currently registered.
trans-unit.target: 撤消当前在指定项（位于内部维护的上下文对象参数表中）下可找到的对象的注册（如果该项当前已注册）。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="S_OK" /><see langword="HRESULT" /> value if the specified key was successfully removed from the table; otherwise, an <see langword="S_FALSE" /><see langword="HRESULT" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果从表中成功移除指定键，则为 <see langword="S_OK" /><see langword="HRESULT" /> 值；否则为 <see langword="S_FALSE" /><see langword="HRESULT" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The structure containing the binding options to set.
trans-unit.target: 包含要设置的绑定选项的结构。

trans-unit.source: Stores a block of parameters in the bind context.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定上下文中存储参数块。

trans-unit.source: These parameters will apply to later <see langword="UCOMIMoniker" /> operations that use this bind context.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数将应用于稍后使用此绑定上下文的 <see langword="UCOMIMoniker" /> 操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::SetBindOptions` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的现有文档`IBindCtx::SetBindOptions`MSDN 库中。
